Antigen receptor regulated signalling pathways in PKD - null DT40 B cells
To further explore the contribution of PKD kinases to DT40 B cell biology we investigated whether specific BCR - regulated signalling events were defective in the PKD - null B cells .

BCR - induced signalling pathways culminate in the activation of gene transcription events that control B cell survival , proliferation and function .
